goal.ch:
The course is designed to help students to understand the contemporary developments in risk management. After having successfully completed this course, students are expected to 
be able to understand the recent development of risk management.
be able to search topics on risk management for their own interests.
be able to provide preliminary empirical evidences for the issues in risk management.
